WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
 
I've been using rawr a lot these last few days to create a BiS item list, comparing my results with simcraft and those of other guildies. I've noticed that under the "Buff => Set Bonuses" menu, the Time Lord's Regalia (T13) 2 pieces Bonus is shown as 0 dps, though I have the 4 part equiped in my file. 
 
Trying to figure this out, I've tried several things.
- I took my actual character and changed 2 items, to equip 2 part T13 and I lose the 4 part T12 without gaining the 2 part T13. I was losing a flat 800 (more or less) dps.
- I reloaded my character from the armory and under the menu set bonuses the 2 part T13 showed its bonus dps. I did the same operation as above, equipping 2 part T13 losing the 4 part T12 with nearly no dps loss, "gaining" what the 2 part T13 should have been.
- Seeing that all my saved files had the same problem, I decided to create a new one, from scratch, doing everything by hand (no armory load, etc). The 2 part T13 set bonus was showing up until I hit the optimize button, giving me an optimized item setup but losing the 2 part T13 set bonus in the menu once again.
 
I'm using the silverlight offline version, but the online one gives me the same results.
 
I can't seem to find how tu upload more than one file at a time. :/
First *.xml (test 9 fire) is my current character.
The second one (test 9 fire bis) is the reloaded from armory character with the 2 part T13 set bonus.
The third one (fire 4.3 HM) is the optimzed setup I had, working from a "previous file".
The fourth one (fire 4.3 HM bis) is the new one I made today, from scratch, that lost the bonus after the optimizer.
 
I'm sorry for my poor english, its not my mother tongue. :/
WorkItem.Summary: [Fire Mage] 2 part t13 giving no bonus

Comments.Message: The issue is that in your current file you have advanced cycle level haste procs enabled, which isn't supported for T13 in this version, it'll be ready for next version.
